verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> or <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed;<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> and give <S%H2167>praise,<s%> <S%H637>even<s%> with my <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> among the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thee among the <S%H3816>nations.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%> and thy <S%H571>truth<s%> reacheth <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds.<s%>
Be thou <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%> and thy <S%H3519>glory<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%>
That <S%H4616><s%> thy <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered:<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> with thy right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and <S%H6030>answer<s%> me.

God <S%H430><s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in his <S%H6944>holiness;<s%> I will <S%H5937>rejoice,<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and mete <S%H4058>out<s%> the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is mine; <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> is mine; <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> also is the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of mine <S%H7218>head;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is my <S%H2710>lawgiver;<s%>

Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my <S%H5518>washpot;<s%> <S%H7366><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H123>Edom<s%> will I cast <S%H7993>out<s%> my <S%H5275>shoe;<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H6429>Philistia<s%> will I <S%H7321>triumph.<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4013>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H5148>lead<s%> me <S%H5704>into<s%> <S%H123>Edom?<s%>
Wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> thou, O <S%H430>God,<s%> who hast cast us <S%H2186>off?<s%> and wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> thou, O <S%H430>God,<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> with our <S%H6635>hosts?<s%>
Give <S%H3051><s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> from <S%H4480>trouble:<s%> <S%H6862><s%> for <S%H7723>vain<s%> is the <S%H8668>help<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>
Through <S%H430>God<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly:<s%> for <S%H1931>he<s%> it is that shall tread <S%H947>down<s%> our <S%H6862>enemies.<s%>
